swapi – creates GUI for swapi.dev using gtk+ 3¶

Description about swapi. This program creates GUI for swapi.dev using gtk+ 3. Shows information about people, planets, species, vehicles, starships from The Star Wars API. Can search object and show the list of objects.

warning: unhandled cursor CursorKind.INCLUSION_DIRECTIVE takejson.h

char *unit¶

unit: String of resource. Depends on button callback functions.

char *search_text¶

search_text: String of search. Information is taken from search editor.

int [6] num

unit: Array of resource’s number.

void output_text(char **atr_arr, int len, int index)¶

output_text() - Displays text.

Parameters

  • atr_arr – array of atributes which this function shows.

  • len – len of atr_arr.

  • index – number of resource.

This function displays information about attributes which was taken from JSON file about resource. Information pass to the text widget.

Context: When information about atribute wasn’t found, this function wright

in widget “none”.

void search_fun(char **atr_arr, int len)¶

search_fun() - Search and displays text.

Parameters

  • atr_arr – array of atributes which this function shows.

  • len – len of atr_arr.

This function search and displays information about attributes which was taken from JSON file about resource. Information pass to the text widget.

Context: When name wasn’t found this function wright in widget “Not in <resource>”.

When information about atribute wasn’t found, this function wright in widget “none”.

void btn_people_cl()¶

btn_people_cl() - Callback function about people.

This function callback output_text() or search_fun(), depends on search status. If search_text = “none” callback output_text() else search_fun(). This fun set unit = “people”.

void btn_planets_cl()¶

btn_people_cl() - Callback function about planets.

This function callback output_text() or search_fun(), depends on search status. If search_text = “none” callback output_text() else search_fun(). This fun set unit = “planets”.

void btn_species_cl()¶

btn_people_cl() - Callback function about species.

This function callback output_text() or search_fun(), depends on search status. If search_text = “none” callback output_text() else search_fun(). This fun set unit = “species”.

void btn_vehicles_cl()¶

btn_people_cl() - callback function about vehicles.

This function callback output_text() or search_fun(), depends on search status. If search_text = “none” callback output_text() else search_fun(). This fun set unit = “vehicles”.

void btn_starships_cl()¶

btn_people_cl() - Callback function about starships.

This function callback output_text() or search_fun(), depends on search status. If search_text = “none” callback output_text() else search_fun(). This fun set unit = “starships”.

void btn_list_cl()¶

btn_people_cl() - Callback function, makes list of objects.

This function makes list of objects depends on resource.

void btn_search_cl()¶

btn_search_cl() - Callback function, makes search.

This function callback button callback function depends on unit.

void btn_right_cl()¶

btn_right_cl() - Callback function, sets number of resource.

This function callback button callback function and increments number of unit depends on unit.

void btn_left_cl()¶

btn_left_cl() - Callback function, sets number of resource.

This function callback button callback function and derements number of unit depends on unit.
